name: Binary Relevance Learning
title: Learning multi-label scene classification
author: Boutell, Matthew R and Luo, Jiebo and Shen, Xipeng and Brown, Christopher M

parameter.name: base_learner
parameter.description: A json object defining the base learner to use. The definition consists of an identifier, identifying the according base learner and a json object defining the parameters of the base learner, if there are any.
